approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

mintingFinished.description: Returns true if minting has been finished.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

unpause.description: Unpauses the contract, allowing token transfers.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller’s account.

paused.description: Returns true if the contract is paused.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of the specified address.

finishMinting.description: Finishes the minting process, disabling further minting.

pause.description: Pauses the contract, preventing token transfers.

owner.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

Mint.description: Emitted when new tokens are minted.

MintFinished.description: Emitted when the minting process is finished.

Pause.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpause.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.
